title: Was the fireman's helmet stolen from the New York Armed Forces on September 11th?
subtitle: The fireman Michael O'Connell has received two clone helmets and several support letters since his 2015 call came out, but his original helmet is no longer available.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The fireman Michael O'Connell asked the Internet for help in locating the helmet he was wearing on September 11th, which was stolen from his house.
